cn.description:

多达 29+ 功能点：

cn.releaseNotes: 添加：第2章-插入排序和归并排序添加描述文档；
cn.description:
参照原书第三版，内容包括：
    第2章 算法入门：插入排序，归并排序；
    第4章 分治法：最大子集问题，矩阵相乘算法[常规算法，分治法，Strassen算法]；
    第6章 堆排序：堆排序[大根堆，小根堆]；
    第7章 快速排序：快速排序；
    第8章 线性时间排序：计数排序；
    第12章 二叉搜索树：二叉搜索树[中序遍历，递归搜索，迭代搜索，迭代最小，迭代最大，后继，先驱，插入，删除]；
    第13章 红黑树：红黑树[插入，删除]；
    第15章 动态规划：切钢条问题[递归，自顶向下，自底向上，打印]，最长公共子序列；
    第16章 贪心算法：活动选择问题[递归，迭代]，Huffman编码；
    第22章 基本图算法：广度优先搜索，深度优先搜索，拓扑排序，强连通分量；
    第23章 最小生成树：最小生成树[Kruskal算法，Prim算法];
    第24章 单源最短路径：Bellman-Ford算法，有向无环图算法，Dijkstra算法；
    第25章 每对顶点间的最短路径：最短路径算法[Slow算法，Faster算法，Floyd-Warshall算法]；
    第26章 最大流：Ford-Fulkerson算法；
    附加内容：Hanoi塔问题，N皇后问题，排序算法性能比较；

主要特点有：
    可单步或连续运行伪码，观察参数和数据结构的变化，有助于理解算法的设计思想；
    可设置程序断点，方便观察算法的断点状态，通过循环不变式验证其正确性；
    提供运行时函数栈，并标记函数返回位置，可轻松跟踪递归函数的运行过程，并有助于理解计算机程序的运行机制；
    记录代码行执行次数，有助于理解算法的时间复杂度；

希望此App能对您学习算法和数据结构有所帮助；

cn.releaseNotes:
1. 支持过滤规则自动更新
2. 修复已知问题
cn.description:
# 100万Safari浏览器用户的选择，新一代浏览器扩展平台。

Stay是一款Safari浏览器扩展功能增强应用，借助Stay可以极大的提升Safari浏览器的浏览体验和可玩性。

Stay支持苹果全平台，并且一次付费即可涵盖 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 设备。

安装Stay后，你的Safari浏览器增加了什么功能？
- 【用户脚本】安装或者编写用户脚本，让你的Safari支持自动翻页、沉浸式翻译、防止跳转、聚合搜索等等功能。
- 【文件下载】增强Safari浏览器中的文件下载，可以选择下载到分类的文件夹，方便管理下载资源。
- 【广告拦截】支持Adguard、uBlock Origin、AdBlock Plus等基于EasyList规范的过滤规则，让你的浏览更加安全和洁净。

买断Stay Pro
- 全平台同步脚本内容以及设置。
- 添加自定义广告过滤规则和在页面上标记广告。
- 网页暗黑模式。

隐私策略：[https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc](https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc)
服务条款：[https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm](https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm)

欢迎访问我们的开源版本地址 [https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay](https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay)
任何问题可以关注官方推特 @stayfork 来反馈。
欢迎加入电报群组 [t.me/fastclipchat](http://t.me/fastclipchat)

hk.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

hk.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

mo.description:
MenubarX 是一款強大的 Mac 菜單欄瀏覽器，把網頁添加到菜單欄上，像原生 App 一樣即開即用，為你打開 Web Apps 的新世界。

- 榮登 ProductHunt 日榜和周榜評獎
- 被海外媒體評選為最值得常駐的菜單欄應用

完美支持各種 Web、Wap、PWA 網站，再也不用煩惱沒有官方 App 的服務了，僅需一個鏈接便可享用全部功能。在菜單欄即可擁有 iPhone、iPad 甚至是 Kindle 模擬器，是 Mac 用戶的提效利器，也是兼顧勞逸結合的神器，聽音樂、看視頻、玩游戲，真正做到隨開隨用。

多達 29+ 功能點：
1.無限標簽頁，無限可能
2.無限書簽收藏
3.自定義首頁
4.支持 AdBlock 自動廣告屏蔽
5.支持自定義JS/CSS腳本
6.豐富的 Web Apps
7.置頂視窗，不遮擋
8.摘下視窗，不受束縛
9.移動設備模擬器
10.切換用戶代理
11.調節尺寸，響應式佈局
12.自動刷新，想你所想
13.老闆鍵
14.深色模式
15.豐富的快捷鍵
16.支持 5 種語言
17.下載管理器
18.彩色網站圖標
19.網站通知推送
20.地址欄快捷搜索
21.原生應用模式
22.音頻持續後台播放
23.本地開發調試
24.第三方整合
25.自定義網站圖標
26.更低資源消耗
27.支持iCloud同步/備份
28.自動銷毀頁面以釋放資源 
29.支持本地文件預覽
30.自定義用戶代理
31.網頁深色模式
32.自訂網路代理（HTTP/Socks5）

更多強大功能持續開發中...
也歡迎在 Twitter(@MenubarX) 或 MenubarX@gmail.com 上反饋和建議

mo.description:
# 100萬Safari瀏覽器用戶的選擇，新一代瀏覽器擴充平台。

Stay是一款Safari瀏覽器擴充功能增強應用，透過Stay可以大幅提升Safari瀏覽器的瀏覽體驗與可玩性。

Stay支援蘋果全平台，一次付費即可涵蓋 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 裝置。

tw.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

advisories: 偶而/輕微的成人/性暗示題材
偶而/輕微的粗話或低俗幽默
偶而/輕微的酒精、菸草或藥物使用或相關內容
tw.releaseNotes:
What's the ratio of a pumpkin's circumference to its diameter? Pumpkin pi.

Updates

• This version includes updates for our upcoming Thanksgiving event.
• 'Tis the season. Grab some hot cocoa and enjoy a round of laughter with "Act It Out", "Holiday Songs", "Holiday Movies", and more starting Nov 19th!
• Get a limited edition snowflake-themed card background with our holiday decks.

Please update your game for the latest content. Happy Playing!
tw.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

Amidst the rock piles in the primeval jungle, Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus Rex, and Pteranodons are scattered and stacked—chaos is about to sweep through the tribe! As the top "organizer" in the tribe, your only mission is to **tap three identical dinosaurs to eliminate them from the pile**! But remember: the inventory slot below has limited space. Once it’s filled up with uneliminated dinosaurs, your primeval cleanup mission will fail immediately! This isn’t a casual game of random taps; it’s a strategic, forward-thinking brain challenge. Every choice you make determines whether you can survive the dino frenzy until the end!

# Primeval Item Vault: Three "Lifesavers" to Break the Deadlock!
When you’re cornered by a full inventory of dinosaurs and can’t find a matchable set, the three heirloom items of the tribe become your "last chance to turn the tide":
- **Corn**: Is your inventory slot about to overflow? Use Corn to instantly clear out all selected dinosaurs in the slot, free up space with one tap, and let you replan your elimination order!
- **Fig**: Missing just one dinosaur to complete a Match-3? The Fig will automatically lock onto the target dinosaur in your inventory, directly complete the set elimination, and help you break through the "stuck" predicament!
- **Meat**: Are the dinosaurs on the field piled in disarray with no elimination opportunities in sight? Meat will completely shuffle the arrangement of all remaining dinosaurs, making new matchable sets take the initiative to "appear"!

## Core Gameplay: Every Step is a "Life-or-Death Prediction"!
The difficulty of Primeval Match-3 lies in its "stacking logic" and "inventory management": Dinosaurs on the field are layered and covered—some hidden at the bottom layer, others blocked by other dinosaurs. You can’t just look at the surface; you must first observe the types of dinosaurs in the lower layers, predict "what will be exposed after eliminating the upper layer," and then decide which set to eliminate first. For example: Eliminating 3 Pteranodons in the upper layer first may unlock 3 Triceratops in the bottom layer; but if you mindlessly tap scattered dinosaurs, you’ll only fill up the inventory quickly and end up failing due to a full slot!

As the levels progress, the number of dinosaur types will exceed 10, and the stacking layers will increase from 2 to 7 or 8. Some dinosaurs are hidden in "dead corners," while others require 2-3 consecutive eliminations to unlock. Only with patient analysis and careful choices can you avoid the crisis of a full inventory and clear all dinosaurs step by step!

The elimination horn in the primeval jungle has sounded! Bring your strategic mind, make good use of your available items, find every breakthrough in the chaotic pile of dinosaurs, and don’t let the inventory slot become your "stumbling block"—set off now and become the "Primeval Match-3 Champion" admired by everyone in the tribe

Love playing charades games? Heads Up! is just that, a fun twist on charades! From naming celebrities, to singing, to silly accents - guess the word on the card that’s on your head from your friends’ clues before the timer runs out!


Play one of the many exciting categories, including fun game decks like Harry Potter, Friends, and Marvel, or create a category all your own!


How to play Heads Up:

Pick a card deck category - check! One player holds the phone to their glorious forehead like a headband, and 3, 2, 1! Go! Guess the words on the screen as your friends excitedly shout out clues. Got an answer right? Ding! Tilt your head down and keep on ruling this guessing game, you genius! Can’t guess what it is? Don’t stress! Just tilt your head up and skip to a new catch phrase. So get your head on straight, and enjoy one of the best party games!


Cool Game Features:

- A fun game for friends, family game night, or to play with hundreds of players at once!

- Draw a new game card simply by tilting your phone!

- Guess what! You can keep videos of your hilarious game play for your own amusement, or share them right to Facebook

• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!
• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.
• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.
• Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES
• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!
• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL
• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!
• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT
• Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!
• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!
• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!
• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!
• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.
